summary: Pfizer is a leading research-based biopharmaceutical company based in the United States with more than 10,000 employees. They strive to deliver innovative therapies to extend and improve patients' lives, focusing on wellness and prevention of diseases. Their goal is to provide access to safe, effective and affordable medicine and health care services. They must be approached through their official website, otherwise individuals and organizations could be running scams.

quiz.question: What is the mission of Pfizer?
answers: To apply science and our global resources to improve health and well-being at every stage of life. We strive to provide access to safe, effective and affordable medicines and health care services to the people who need them.
To be a leader in the biopharmaceutical industry.
